entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning late this evening. Amount 10 mm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 late this evening except south 60 over exposed coastal sections late this evening and overnight. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 5:59 PM PST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 6.
